  <div class="directive-tweet-body">
    People don't want to use your software.<br><br>They want to lose weight, laugh, be entertained, get smarter, spend time with loved ones, go home on time, sleep adequately, eat good food, be happy.<br><br>Your product is only as good as the experiences it enables people to have.
